sentences.sentence: "I don't feel any freer," she explains. "Because I never felt unfree."
sentences.translation: “我一点也没有觉得更加自由了”，她解释说，“因为我从来没有觉得不自由。”

sentences.sentence: Moreover, this line of thinking seems to me insulting to the unfree world.
sentences.translation: 再者，这样的想法在我看来是对尚未自由的国家的侮辱。

sentences.sentence: The digital media have become important tools of communication not just to but within unfree societies.
sentences.translation: 数字媒体早已成为非自由社会的重要沟通工具。
